description: Surrogate primary key for a configuration row; uniquely identifies a property setting.
Name of the business object or view the property applies to.
Target field within the object to which the property setting applies.
Type of setting being configured for the field (e.g., behavior, display, validation).
Configured value for the specified property, controlling behavior, formatting, visibility, or display options.
Timestamp when this property record was last updated; used for audit and synchronization.
